description: Update the ``aws opsworks`` command to the latest version
Fix bug where shorthand lists with a single item (e.g. ``--arg Param=[item]``) were not parsed correctly. (`issue 830 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/830>`__)
Fix bug when rendering only scalars that are numbers in text output (`issue 829 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/829>`__)
Fix bug where ``--endpoint-url`` is required even for ``help`` subcommands (`issue 828 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/828>`__)
